title: Ncam AR Suite Lite
description: Ncam AR Suite Lite is an open source plug-in that provides a complete solution for delivering real-time photorealistic virtual production. Add innovative AR content to your production using Ncam Camera Tracking and Ncam AR Suite Lite.
longDescription:
Ncam AR Suite Lite is an open source plug-in for the Unreal Engine that provides a complete solution for delivering photorealistic virtual production. It has been used across the world to produce innovative augmented reality content for high profile live broadcast, TV episodic, feature film and e-sports productions.

The Ncam AR Suite Lite provides all of the essential tools, source code and augmented reality pipelines to empower you to unleash your creative potential using Ncam camera tracking and easily bring real-time, photorealistic augmented reality to your productions. We believe that by giving you a complete tool suite that has no cost and no restrictions, your creativity will have no limitations.


Complete AR solution available to everyone for free:

  1. Complete solution for producing Virtual Studio and Virtual Overlay real time augmented reality within UE4
  2. Open, modular and extensible design
  3. An intuitive wizard allows new virtual production projects to be created and configured in minutes
  4. Built from the ground up using native UE4 frameworks it integrates seamlessly with:
  5. Live Link - Providing instant, live camera tracking data to UE4
  6. Media Framework - Supporting combinations of AJA and Black Magic SDI cards
  7. Composure - For compositing live video with virtual graphics and visual effects
  8. Sequencer - To record and replay Ncam camera tracking
  9. Multi-User Editing - Allowing many Ncam cameras to share one virtual space that can be modified live
  10. nDisplay - To drive LED walls using Ncam tracking data including off-axis (POV) projection
  11. Timecode Synchronizer - For perfectly aligning all data sources together
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Read data streams from Ncam Reality tracking systems.
  • Easily configure and synchronize Live Link and Media Framework data sources.
  • Render and composite virtual elements live onto SDI video to produce augmented reality content.
  • Supports input and output SDI video using AJA and Blackmagic Design plugins.
  • Includes all necessary components for producing Virtual Studio and Virtual Overlay real time augmented reality within UE4.

Code Modules:Â 

  • Runtime modules:
  • NcamMedia
  • NcamProfile
  • NcamSource
  • NcamTrackingLiveLink
  • Editor modules:
  • NcamMediaEditor
  • NcamProfileEditor
  • NcamSourceEditor


Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of C++ Classes: 58

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://docs.ncam-tech.com/arsuite


Example Project: No example project is provided as the setup depends on your machine configuration.
